verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who shall <S%H7931>sojourn<s%> in thy <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>? Who shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>?
He that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly<s%>, and <S%H6466>worketh<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart<s%>;

He that <S%H7270>slandereth<s%> not with his <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, Nor <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> to his <S%H7453>friend<s%>, Nor taketh <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> against his <S%H7138>neighbor<s%>;

In whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a <S%H3988>reprobate<s%> is <S%H959>despised<s%>, But who <S%H3513>honoreth<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; He that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> to his own <S%H7489>hurt<s%>, and changeth <S%H4171>not<s%>;

He that putteth not <S%H5414>out<s%> his <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H5392>interest<s%>, Nor <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%> against the <S%H5355>innocent<s%>. He that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> these things shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
